mapper.insert: insert into tourist spot ( t_trsmicNm, t_trsmicLc, t_ctprvnNm, t_signguNm, t_trsmicIntrcn, t_adiSvcInfo, t_rstde, t_summerOperOpenHhmm, t_summerOperCloseHhmm, t_winterOperOpenHhmm, t_winterOperCloseHhmm, t_avrgWorkCo, t_engGuidanceYn, t_jpGuidanceYn, t_chGuidanceYn, t_guidanceFggg, t_guidancePhoneNumber, t_rdnmadr, t_lnmadr, t_operInstitutionNm, t_homepageUrl, t_latitude, t_longitude, t_referenceDate, t_instt_code, t_instt_nm ) value( #{t_trsmicNm}, #{t_trsmicLc}, #{t_ctprvnNm}, #{t_signguNm}, #{t_trsmicIntrcn}, #{t_adiSvcInfo}, #{t_rstde}, #{t_summerOperOpenHhmm}, #{t_summerOperCloseHhmm}, #{t_winterOperOpenHhmm}, #{t_winterOperCloseHhmm}, #{t_avrgWorkCo}, #{t_engGuidanceYn}, #{t_jpGuidanceYn}, #{t_chGuidanceYn}, #{t_guidanceFggg}, #{t_guidancePhoneNumber}, #{t_rdnmadr}, #{t_lnmadr}, #{t_operInstitutionNm}, #{t_homepageUrl}, #{t_latitude}, #{t_longitude}, #{t_referenceDate}, #{t_instt_code}, #{t_instt_nm} )
